import React from 'react' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' import $ from 'jquery' const Signature = () => { const addColor = () => { $('.collection_title li').on('click', function(){ $('.collection_title li').removeAttr('id','none'); $(this).attr('id','on'); }); }; const {citrus1,citrus2,citrus3,citrus4} = useSelector(state => state.perfume); const {floral1,floral2,floral3,floral4} = useSelector(state => state.perfume); const {fruity1,fruity2,fruity3,fruity4} = useSelector(state => state.perfume); const {green1,green2,green3,green4} = useSelector(state => state.perfume); const {woody1,woody2,woody3,woody4} = useSelector(state => state.perfume); const {musk1,musk2,musk3,musk4} = useSelector(state => state.perfume); return( <>
